section.name: HPI
section.text: The patient, Mrs. Fields, is a 49 year old female who came into the ER complaining of SOB and pain in her chest.\nShe has had an MI about two years ago and does know if she has ever been diagnosed with angina.

section.name: PMH
section.text: The patient had an MI two years ago and has a family history of heart disease.\nHer father died of an MI about 15 years ago.

section.name: DX
section.text: Mrs. Fields suffers from Prinzmetal's Angina.
